VIRGIN AND THE LOVER
(Gourmet Video, 1973)

Director: Kemal Horulu
Running Time: 1:19:43

Paul, a highly sensitive and creative artist, unable to fulfill his manhood in the "real world" because of an early trauma, creates a sexual fantasy world of his own whose principal love object is a female mannequin. Through his imagination, he seemingly brings the mannequin to life to assume the identity of various women who are part of his life...

Eric Edwards stars in the psychologically driven tale of a man trapped inside his own sexual fantasy world. It seems that he's only ever fallen for one woman, a gal who died in a tragic car crash years before. Now, Eric lives with a mannequin that he's dressed up in her old clothes and has vivid dreams about the dummy coming to life and trysting with him. This is early porn at its most complex and ambitious, taking a long, hard look at modern relationships even while serving up a series of white-hot sex scenes. They don't make 'em like this anymore - artsy moody and scorchingly erotic. Featuring the breathtaking Jennifer Welles. Contains hardcore and softcore action.
